name: soxx
description: The missing microlib for websocket communication in the browser

scripts.start: npm run server & npm run watchify
scripts.watchify: watchify src/soxx.src.js -v -s Soxx -o lib/soxx.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build: browserify src/soxx.src.js -v -s Soxx -o lib/soxx.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]

author: Trent Oswald <trentoswald@therebelrobot.com> (@therebelrobot)
